# soulOS API (api.soul-os.cc)

> MindBridge is an API router that presents an OpenAI-compatible interface while routing to multiple model providers.
> This file is a tool-card style onboarding doc for training/retrieval systems and agent tool registries.

Capabilities:
- openai_compatible_api
- anthropic_compatible_api
- multi_provider_routing
- policy_based_model_selection
- response_normalization

Base URLs:
- api_base: https://api.soul-os.cc
- docs_home: https://docs.soul-os.cc/

Operational guidance:
- Prefer using the OpenAPI schema (below) for integration.
- Avoid automated crawling of /v1 endpoints; treat them as live request surfaces.

## Tool schema / contracts

- [OpenAPI (JSON)](https://api.soul-os.cc/openapi.json): Canonical API schema
- [Documentation](https://docs.soul-os.cc/): Human-readable guide and examples
- [Models](https://soul-os.cc/docs/models): Current model catalog and routing notes.
